attributes.action: ensure that local communities are aware when dangerous criminals and paedophiles live in their area so that children and vulnerable groups are informed and protected and to also ensure that criminals that are too dangerous stay in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I belive that this will be beneficial to all communities in the UK. There are too many cases of dangerous and violent criminals living in family areas that have access to schools, centres and care homes. 

We should protect the most vulnerable people in our society and to do this the majority of criminals and paedophiles should remain in prison.
